name: Cult of Blood
description:
Your childhood friend, Noah has suddenly gone missing this morning, can you, an average caller bystander face the cult of the church over the cliff?

Cult Of Blood is a Metroidvania-Platformer like proyect I'm currently working on

Controls:

Z: Jump

X: Attack

Left/Right: Move your character around

Made by: Eduardo Licapa, Fabio Sanchez,  Gonzalo Penaranda

Enjoy!
